General.Name: Globe Kita Terang Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Globe Kita Terang Tbk engages in the retail and distribution of cellular phones and accessories in Indonesia. The company offers starterpack and reload vouchers, simcards, coffee machines, and operator products, as well as produces coffee beans. It sells its products through online and offline stores. The company was formerly known as PT Global Teleshop Tbk and changed its name to PT Globe Kita Terang Tbk in June 2021. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Globe Kita Terang Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Trikomsel Oke Tbk.
General.Address: JL Kebon Sirih Raya. Kav. 63, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10340
